## symmetric() function

Yields an iterator of all `src` values, followed by the same values in reverse order. Efficiently builds the reversed order via an internal linked list.

```
[...symmetric([1, 2, 3])]
// [ 1, 2, 3, 3, 2, 1 ]

```

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function symmetric<T>(src: Iterable<T>): Generator<T, void, unknown>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  src | <code>Iterable&lt;T&gt;</code> |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

`Generator<T, void, unknown>`
